long-description.p: Used solar panel conveyor for sale by American Surplus transports glass panels across the conveyor. The inspection table is 46" x 53" and the indexing turntables are duel direction. There are three types of single transport. 29.5" x 77" gravity roller, 57" x 53" gravity roller, and 18.5" x 77" gravity roller. It features a 57" x 53" air cylinder on the duel direction and a die table with a 55" x 53" air cylinder. The swing table swings 90 degrees. The indexing turntables are duel direction. Call our sales team to learn more about used solar panel conveyor and get a quote today.
